Summary: july 28 2011-night-un known hour-saw a orb of light outside kitchen window later a second or two when i noticed it,
divs: Sighting Detailsthese events happened in this order-july 28 night time hour unknown-saw a small orb of light size of baseball outside my kitchen window lated a few seconds and disapeared.later that night in early morning at 1:58 am was watching late night tv when a flash of light flashed outside my living room window.it was bright it was like a flash on a camera but but brighter.it was so bright it caught my attention.went outside to see if there was anything more.it was so silent it made me feel nervous.I live in the woods nxt to a stream.this was july 29 2011. august 2 2011-2:41am was looking out my kitchen window to lok to see if there were any unwanted pest in my lawn.I looked up and saw an orb size of a basketball moving low in the sky flying behind the grove of trees.ran outside to see if I could see more but it was gone....last summer 2010 was out in the back yard it was eveing time still light.I got a lawn chair to sit on and enjoy the summer evening was looking towards the west sky right above the tree line a giant silver shinny orb appeared and then disapeared.it was huge bigger than a house and a shinny silver polished metal.gone in a blink. july 31 2011 evening was laying down watching tv when I heard a beeping sound in my left ear it wasnt a ringing it was a beeping sound.before all of this I have had strange ufo dreams mixed with miltary crafts.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Mossyrock
There were no other sightings in Mossyrock on or around July 28th 2011
